meta_description: The Ashley Gibson Barnett Museum of Art (The AGB) at Florida Southern College is an academic and community museum that engages audiences of all ages with world-class exhibitions, programs, and experiences; the Museum offers avenues for lifelong learning and ways to see and reflect on our shared worl
hours_text:
The Museum is located in Downtown Lakeland just two blocks north of the Florida Southern College campus and across from the Lakeland Public Library on Lake Morton. _Free parking is available._  
  
800 East Palmetto Street  
Lakeland, FL 33801-5529  

## Museum Hours

### Regular Hours:

Tues, Wed, Fri, Sat, 10am to 4pm  
Thursday, 10am to 8pm  
Sunday, 1 to 5pm*

 **_*The Museum is closed Sundays, June through Labor Day._**

The Museum is closed to the public on Mondays and major holidays, including New Years Eve.

### Administrative Offices:

_Monday through Friday_ 8am to 5pm, by appointment only.  
Closed Saturday, Sunday, and major holidays.

## Accessibility

The Museum is wheelchair accessible. Designated parking spots and wheelchair ramps are present in the Museum parking lot. A wheelchair is available at the Visitor Services desk in the front lobby for guests needing assistance. Wall text is installed to be read at wheelchair height.

## 800 East Palmetto Street, Lakeland, FL 33801-5529

### Visiting Lakeland? To find [Lakeland hotels](http://www.hotelscombined.com/Place/Lakeland.htm) nearby, visit [HotelsCombined.com](http://www.hotelscombined.com/Place/Lakeland.htm).

* * *

## While You're Here

### Tours:

The Ashley Gibson Barnett Museum of Art offers personalized private tours year-round for school and youth groups, college course visits, and adult, corporate, and community groups. Click below for more information.

[ Tours ](/tours)

collections_text:
#  Admission to the Museum is always free 

[ Plan your visit ](/visit)

## The Ashley Gibson Barnett Museum of Art (The AGB) at Florida Southern College

The Museum, formerly known as the Polk Museum of Art, is located in Downtown Lakeland just two blocks north of the Florida Southern College campus across from the Lakeland Public Library on Lake Morton. 

* * *
